Package org.neo4j.test.rule

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DbmsRule.RestartAction  
    SuppressOutput.Suppressible  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbmsRule  
    EmbeddedDbmsRule
    JUnit @Rule for configuring, creating and managing an embedded database instance.
    ExternalResource
    A better version of ExternalResource that properly handles exceptions in ExternalResource.after(boolean).
    ImpermanentDbmsRule
    JUnit @Rule for configuring, creating and managing an ImpermanentGraphDatabase instance.
    OtherThreadRule  
    PageCacheAndDependenciesRule
    Very often when you want a PageCacheRule you also want TestDirectory and some FileSystemRule.
    PageCacheConfig
    Class to alter behavior and configuration of PageCache instances opened in this rule.
    PageCacheRule  
    PageCacheRule.AtomicBooleanInconsistentReadAdversary  
    PageCacheRule.RandomInconsistentReadAdversary  
    RandomRule
    Like a Random but guarantees to include the seed with the test failure, which helps greatly in debugging.
    SuppressOutput
    Suppresses outputs such as System.out, System.err and java.util.logging for example when running a test.
    SuppressOutput.Voice  
    TestDirectory
    This class defines a JUnit rule which ensures that the test's working directory is cleaned up.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SuppressOutput.System  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    RandomRule.Seed
